A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The worst character assassination I've ever seen. We get it\, Rian has a hard on for Kylo. Every character suffers to make him look good. Dunno who that Luke Skywalker was but he wasn't the gentle\, good hearted man who only saw the good in others in the OT. We should have been more afraid when Mark said he hated the script and the choices for Luke.
